rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Vastu-aligned entrance with north facing for positive energy, includes a reception area and storage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious Mediterranean-style living room with natural light from north windows, featuring stone accents and wooden beams.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen adjacent to the dining area, optimized for efficient workflow and south-east facing for positive energy. Includes an island counter.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan dining area that connects with the living room, ideal for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment room designed as a home theater in the west part of the ground floor, with soundproofing and ambient lighting to create an immersive experience.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy library space on the east side, designed for quiet reading and study, with built-in bookshelves in line with Vastu's east orientation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom on the south side of the ground floor, featuring large windows and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with its own ensuite bathroom for visitors.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Common bathroom shared between the master and guest bedrooms, located in a west corner for privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with private bathroom and balcony, situated on the south side to harness morning light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with adjoining en-suite bathroom on the upper floor.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Functional study or home office space located in the east wing, designed for productivity and inspired by Mediterranean aesthetics.

rooms.name: Additional Bathroom
rooms.description: Extra bathroom serving both bedrooms for convenience.

openings.direction: Southwest for morning light and energy balance.
